backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a trading journal app that manages user trades, profiles, strategies, and risk settings with role-based access control and per-user data isolation.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state from an older schema (without strategies) to the new schema by adding an empty strategies map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs to their associated source files, components, and test requirement IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the purpose and key functionality of every frontend component, page, hook, and utility.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Trading Journal SPA that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router, React Query, dark ThemeProvider, and an AuthGuard that gates all routes behind Internet Identity authentication and shows a ProfileSetupModal for new users.
frontend/src/components/EditTradeModal.t: A modal dialog component for editing an existing trade's fields (entry price, stop loss, target, P&L, strategy, emotion, notes) with form validation and a mutation call to update the trade.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main app layout component providing a sidebar with navigation links, user profile display, and a logout button, with mobile drawer support.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: A full-page login screen that authenticates users via Internet Identity, displaying app branding, feature highlights, and login status feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog shown to new users to enter and save their trader display name before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/StrategyAutocomp: A text input with dropdown autocomplete for selecting trading strategies, supporting substring and abbreviation matching with keyboard navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: A React Query hook that fetches the currently authenticated user's profile from the backend actor, waiting until the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor operations including CRUD for trades, strategies, risk settings, and backup/restore functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Provides a mutation hook to save the caller's user profile via the backend actor, invalidating the cached profile query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for a dark theme, Tailwind base/component/utility layers, and reusable component classes like glassmorphism cards and neon buy/sell buttons.
frontend/src/lib/tradeUtils.ts: Utility functions for trade calculations including P&L, risk/reward ratio, formatting helpers, and aggregation functions for overall and monthly trade statistics.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Analytics dashboard page that displays monthly P&L bar charts, emotion distribution pie charts, and a sortable strategy performance table derived from trade data.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with summary stat cards, a 7-day P&L area chart, and a recent trades list using data from the useGetTrades hook.
frontend/src/pages/NewTradePage.tsx: Provides a form for logging a new trade, including fields for entry/exit prices, conviction rating, risk calculator, emotions, and mistakes, then submits via the useAddTrade hook.
frontend/src/pages/RiskManagementPage.ts: Displays live P&L risk status against configurable account size and daily max loss limits, and provides export/import backup functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows app info and theme details, and provides a strategy manager UI that lists saved strategies with the ability to delete them via the useDeleteStrategy hook.
frontend/src/pages/TradeLogPage.tsx: Renders a filterable, searchable list of all logged trades with support for expanding trade details, editing via a modal, and deleting individual trades.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, CSS-variable-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations, and plugin registrations for a trading journal UI.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 3) describing the Trading Journal app's existing features, architectural notes, and requirements including strategy analytics, trade editing, and autocomplete strategy memory.
